mapper.insert: insert into food_find.order (userId, truckId, description, totalPrice, orderTime, orderStatus) values (#{userId}, #{truckId}, #{description}, #{totalPrice}, now(), "RECEIVED");
mapper.select: select o.orderId, o.userId, o.truckId, o.description, totalPrice, orderTime, orderStatus, orderItemId, oi.itemId, quantity, t.name truckName, u.username customerName, fi.name itemName from food_find.order o join orderitem oi on o.orderId = oi.orderid join foodtruck t on o.truckId=t.truckId join user u on u.userId=o.userId join fooditem fi on fi.itemId=oi.itemId where o.orderId=#{orderId};
mapper.update: update food_find.order set orderStatus ="CANCEL" where orderId = #{orderId};
